(I'm giving Zardus authority to use Oblitercons whenever he wants, since I 
have football practice and homework that will take up a lot of spare time, 
and I won't be able to participate in the NBW RPG as much until football is 
over)

The Oblitercons:


Recieving the Oblitercons, the gestalt team exited the Alliance base quickly, 
and headed off for where Zardus had told them to go.
